meanings.sent1: The interlunary celebration took place under the light of both moons.
meanings.sent2: The interlunary phase is a magical time when both moons are visible in the sky.
meanings.sent3: During the interlunary festival, people dance under the glow of the twin moons.
meanings.sent4: The interlunary sky was a mesmerizing sight with both moons shining brightly.
meanings.sent5: The interlunary period is when the sky is adorned with the beauty of two moons.

meanings.definition: Relating to the time between two moons.
meanings.sent1: The interlunary cycle marks the time between the full moons.
meanings.sent2: The interlunary phase is a time of transition from one moon to the next.
meanings.sent3: The interlunary journey was filled with anticipation for the next moon's arrival.
meanings.sent4: In the interlunary period, the sky holds the secrets of the passing moon.
meanings.sent5: The interlunary nights are a reminder of the passage of time between moons.
